name: Nomad
description: Nomad Tibetan Restaurant serves traditional Tibetan cuisine with a modern twist! We take great pride in using fresh and high quality ingredients to prepare our delicious recipes. Our restaurant décor is inspired by traditional Tibetan vista, art and artefacts. When you visit us, you will experience the famous Tibetan hospitality and the best of Tibetan cuisine at very reasonable prices.  We assure you that the Nomad Team will do our best so that you will have an unforgettable dining experience!

name: Momofuku
description: David Chang offers his inventive takes on Asian fare at this airy, modern outpost next to Milk Bar.

name: Rich Table
description: Chefs Evan and Sarah Rich elevate the comfort food we know and love to utterly delectable heights. Doughnuts are made with dried porcini and raclette, cacio e pepe comes laced with sea urchin, chicken liver mousse is paired with black sesame angel cake, and we’re better off for it.

name: Burma Superstar
description: Famed for its tea-leaf salad, this bustling Burmese eatery is smallish & doesn't take reservations.

name: House of Prime Rib
description: 62 years of loyal customers can't be wrong. We are grateful to all of our customers, employees, and critics (...though we may not always agree!). The only way to find out the truth is with a visit. Oft imitated, never duplicated. Thank you in advance.

name: Roister
description: Roister is the Alinea Group's convivial & casual restaurant. At Roister we've built our kitchens to be the restaurant and surround our guests. And our chefs are an integral part of service. Roister's food is rooted in primal cooking techniques combined with modern technology and an open hearth. The results are an award winning combination of understated platings and vibrant flavors.
